name: Night Fishing
description:
A game by Jay Clipperton and George Simpson.

Catch the fish with your trawling net. Throw buoys into the water and surround signs of fish with your net. Drag your net behind you to catch your prize.

  • [Space] Put down oars to throw your net
  • [E] Look at your Buoys 
  • [WASD] Row your boat
  • [Left Click] Throw Buoys
  • [Left Click] To Pick Up Caught Fish

Alt+F4 to quit game (we forgot to put that feature in)

You have a purpose and it must be fulfilled.
